27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ali narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"Indeed in Paradise there are chambers, whose outside can be seen from their inside, and their inside can be seen from their outside." A Bedouin stood and said : 'Who are they for, O Messenger of Allah?" He said: "For those who speak well, feed others, fast regularly, and perform salat [for Allah] during the night while the people sleep

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَوْلِ الْمَعْرُوفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Saying What Is Good
